com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast

Class QueryableBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.AbstractBroadcaster
      • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.QueryableBroadcaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broadcaster

    public final class QueryableBroadcaster
extends AbstractBroadcaster
    A broadcaster that stores all received broadcasts for later retrieval.

    This can handle finding broadcasts of all types, but prefer to use one of the TypeInterestBroadcasters if you're only interested in a single type.
